description: This file defines a minimal utility for generating JSON error messages, intended for unit testing and basic error handling within the AppGateway project.

classes.name: ErrorUtils
classes.description: A class providing static methods to generate JSON-formatted error messages for different error scenarios.

methods.name: void CustomInitialize(const std::string & message,std::string & out)
methods.description: Generates a JSON string indicating an initialization error, including a custom message.

methods.name: void CustomInternal(const std::string & message,std::string & out)
methods.description: Generates a JSON string indicating an internal error, including a custom message.

methods.name: void CustomBadRequest(const std::string & message,std::string & out)
methods.description: Generates a JSON string indicating a bad request error, including a custom message.

methods.name: void NotSupported(std::string & out)
methods.description: Generates a JSON string indicating an unsupported feature or operation.

methods.name: void NotAvailable(std::string & out)
methods.description: Generates a JSON string indicating that a resource or service is not available.

ctags.name: CustomBadRequest
ctags.pattern: /^    static void CustomBadRequest(const std::string& message, std::string& out)$/

ctags.name: CustomInitialize
ctags.pattern: /^    static void CustomInitialize(const std::string& message, std::string& out)$/

ctags.name: CustomInternal
ctags.pattern: /^    static void CustomInternal(const std::string& message, std::string& out)$/
